verbose_text: Knockdown of the ER stress induced endonuclease IRE1, unlike knock-down of ZCCHC6, ZCCHC11, and DIS3L2, promoted cell death (data not shown), making it unlikely that this nuclease is responsible for apoptotic mRNA decay.
evidence: ER stress-induced endonuclease IRE1              , unlike knock-down of ZCCHC6, ZCCHC11, and DIS3L2, promoted cell death
